attributes.action: ban the use and distribution of khat.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been married to a somali man who has the same habbit as most other somali men do. He chews khat all night and sleeps all day. He cannot keep any job because of this, he does not help me with the children or the household, he does not bring any money in. I don't understand why khat is still legal in the UK. It makes so many wives and children unhappy and so many men completely useless.
